context_bundle.summary: XSS (Cross-Site Scripting) prevention: Escape output based on context (HTML entity encoding, JavaScript escaping, URL encoding, CSS escaping). Use framework auto-escaping (React, Vue, Angular). Content Security Policy (CSP) headers. Sanitize rich text with libraries (DOMPurify). Never insert untrusted data in <script>, event handlers, CSS.

onboarding.quick_start: XSS prevention: Context-aware output escaping. HTML: escape <, >, &, ', ". JavaScript: JSON.stringify + escape. URL: encodeURIComponent. Use framework auto-escaping. CSP headers. DOMPurify for rich text. Never: untrusted data in <script>, onclick, href=javascript:, <style>.
